mapper.insert: insert into school_type (type_name, school_index, undergraduate_index, master_index, doctor_index, aschool_index,aundergraduate_index,amaster_index,adoctor_index) values(#{typeName},#{schoolIndex},#{undergraduateIndex},#{masterIndex},#{doctorIndex}, #{aschoolIndex},#{aundergraduateIndex},#{amasterIndex},#{adoctorIndex})
mapper.update: update school_type set type_name = #{typeName}, school_index = #{schoolIndex}, undergraduate_index = #{undergraduateIndex}, master_index = #{masterIndex}, doctor_index = #{doctorIndex}, aschool_index = #{aschoolIndex}, aundergraduate_index = #{aundergraduateIndex}, amaster_index = #{amasterIndex}, adoctor_index = #{adoctorIndex} where id = #{id}
